程序包 engine.actions

类 Actions

java.lang.Object
engine.actions.Actions
所有已实现的接口:
java.lang.Iterable<Action>
public class Actions
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<Action>
A thin wrapper for java.util.ArrayList<Action> that does not allow nulls to be added. Reference FIT2099_Assignment1_v2

  • 构造器概要

    构造器
    构造器 说明
    Actions()
    Constructs an empty list.
    Actions​(Action action)
    Constructs a collection containing a single (non-null) Action.

  • 方法概要

    修饰符和类型 方法 说明
    boolean add​(Action action)
    Appends a single Action to this collection, if it is non-null.
    void add​(Actions actions)
    Appends the contents of another Actions list to this one.
    void add​(java.util.List<Action> actions)
    Appends the contents of any List<Action> to this one.
    void clear()
    Delete the contents of this collection, leaving it empty.
    Action get​(int i)
    Return the i'th Action in the collection.
    java.util.List<Action> getUnmodifiableActionList()
    Create and return an unmodifiable copy of the contents of the collection.
    java.util.Iterator<Action> iterator()
    Returns an Iterator for the underlying collection.
    void remove​(Action action)
    Remove the first occurrence of an Action from the collection, if it is present.
    int size()
    Count the number of Actions in the collection.
    java.util.List<Action> sorted​(java.util.Comparator<Action> comparator)
    Returns a sorted copy of the list of Actions.

    从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    forEach, spliterator

  • 构造器详细资料

    • Actions

      public Actions()
      Constructs an empty list.

    • Actions

      public Actions​(Action action)
      Constructs a collection containing a single (non-null) Action.
      参数:
      action - the Action to add

  • 方法详细资料

    • add

      public void add​(Actions actions)
      Appends the contents of another Actions list to this one.
      参数:
      actions - the Actions to append

    • add

      public void add​(java.util.List<Action> actions)
      Appends the contents of any List<Action> to this one. This overload allows the use of an unmodifiableList to prevent privacy leaks.
      参数:
      actions - the List<Action> to append

    • add

      public boolean add​(Action action)
      Appends a single Action to this collection, if it is non-null. If it is null, then it is ignored.
      参数:
      action - the Action to append
      返回:
      true unconditionally

    • iterator

      public java.util.Iterator<Action> iterator()
      Returns an Iterator for the underlying collection. Implementing this method means that Actions implements the Iterable interface, which allows you to use it in a foreach, e.g. for (Action a: actions) { ...
      指定者:
      iterator 在接口中 java.lang.Iterable<Action>
      返回:
      an iterator
      另请参阅:
      Iterable.iterator()

    • sorted

      public java.util.List<Action> sorted​(java.util.Comparator<Action> comparator)
      Returns a sorted copy of the list of Actions.
      参数:
      comparator - an object that can compare two Actions and determine their ordering
      返回:
      a sorted shallow copy of the list of Actions

    • clear

      public void clear()
      Delete the contents of this collection, leaving it empty.

    • size

      public int size()
      Count the number of Actions in the collection.
      返回:
      the number of Actions in the collection.

    • remove

      public void remove​(Action action)
      Remove the first occurrence of an Action from the collection, if it is present. If it is not present, the list is unchanged.
      参数:
      action - the Action to remove

    • get

      public Action get​(int i)
      Return the i'th Action in the collection.
      参数:
      i - index of the Action to retrieve
      返回:
      the i'th Action in the collection
      抛出:
      java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - when i >= this.size()

    • getUnmodifiableActionList

      public java.util.List<Action> getUnmodifiableActionList()
      Create and return an unmodifiable copy of the contents of the collection.
      返回:
      an unmodifiable list of Action
